content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tags are very important for an article and for the Infoportal in general. When you put correct tags, all articles with similar subjectsÂ will be associated.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0, 0, 0)\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"font-size\":\"medium\",\"font-style\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-ligatures\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-caps\":\"normal\",\"font-weight\":\"400\",\"letter-spacing\":\"normal\",\"orphans\":\"2\",\"text-align\":\"start\",\"text-indent\":\"0px\",\"text-transform\":\"none\",\"white-space\":\"normal\",\"widows\":\"2\",\"word-spacing\":\"0px\",\"-webkit-text-stroke-width\":\"0px\",\"text-decoration-style\":\"initial\",\"text-decoration-color\":\"initial\",\"display\":\"inline !important\",\"float\":\"none\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Start typing a word and the appropriate tad should appear. If a tag does not appear, type the whole word and double-click the Enter and a new tag will be added. Double-clicking enter you must be sure that this tag will be used more than once.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0, 0, 0)\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"font-size\":\"medium\",\"font-style\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-ligatures\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-caps\":\"normal\",\"font-weight\":\"400\",\"letter-spacing\":\"normal\",\"orphans\":\"2\",\"text-align\":\"start\",\"text-indent\":\"0px\",\"text-transform\":\"none\",\"white-space\":\"normal\",\"widows\":\"2\",\"word-spacing\":\"0px\",\"-webkit-text-stroke-width\":\"0px\",\"text-decoration-style\":\"initial\",\"text-decoration-color\":\"initial\",\"display\":\"inline !important\",\"float\":\"none\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
